attributes.action: bring back weekly household bin collections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
are you ready for the summer stink?
i am all for recyling, but household rubbish containing meat,bread, leftover food etc needs to be collected weekly to stop the terrible smells, maggots, mould, flies, and bacteria from forming.
bring back weekly rubbish collections!

rejection.details: There are already petitions up and running on this subject.  Please sign one of those instead, thanks
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
